title: Indian Professional Services: Unlocking Global Markets Through FTA Commitments
content:
# Indian Professional Services: Unlocking Global Markets Through FTA Commitments

Ek important update hai. Government ne Free Trade Agreements (FTAs) ke तहत professional services par legally binding commitments ke through global markets unlock karne ke liye apni strategy announce ki hai. Commerce Secretary ne is par زور diya hai.

**Key Highlights:**

*   **Objective:** Commerce Secretary Shri Rajesh Agrawal ne kaha ki FTAs ke under professional services par legally binding commitments se Indian professional services ke liye global markets open honge. Isse India ki economy ko boost milega aur services trade ka contribution badhega.
*   **Chintan Shivir:** Yeh announcement Department of Commerce, Ministry of Commerce and Industry द्वारा Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) aur Services Exports Promotion Council (SEPC) ke collaboration mein 23 December 2025 ko Vanijya Bhawan, New Delhi mein organize kiye gaye "Chintan Shivir on Professional Services" mein ki gayi.
*   **Focus Areas:**
    *   **Enhanced Stakeholder Coordination:** Industry stakeholders ke beech behtar coordination par emphasis diya gaya hai.
    *   **Domestic Ecosystem Reforms:** Professional services ke liye domestic ecosystem mein reforms laane ki zaroorat hai.
    *   **Skill Upgradation:** Professionals ko global market needs aur technological developments, jaise Artificial Intelligence, ke saath align karne ke liye skills upgrade karna critical hai.
    *   **Global Best Practices:** Indian professionals ko global best practices adopt karne ke liye encourage kiya ja raha hai.
    *   **MRAs and FTAs:** Mutual Recognition Agreements (MRAs) aur FTAs ko leverage karke international mobility badhane aur digital delivery of services ko future-proof karne par bhi discussions hue.
*   **Demographic Dividend:** India ke demographic dividend ko global demand for professional services meet karne ki immense potential mana gaya hai.
